get.description: Gets list of users of the chat.
Gets logged user's public profile info.
Gets logged user's private profile info.
Gets the invitations list of logged user

post.description: Logged User accepts invitation to join group

parameters.name: groupid
parameters.description: id of group to accept invitation

delete.description: Logged User regrets invitation to join group

parameters.name: groupid
parameters.description: id of group to accept invitation

get.description: Gets a list of groups of the logged user
Gets the user list of the group.

post.description: Adds the user :userid1 to the group if logged user is the admin of the group.

delete.description: Deletes the user :userid1 from the group if logged user is the admin of the group.

post.description: Invites the user :userid1 to the group if logged user is the admin of the group and if user :userid1 is not a member of the group and does not have an invitation pending for the group.

parameters.description: groupid on which to create a channel
